post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
Canada tops gloomy forecast By Terry Weber Globe and Mail Update Wednesday, September 25 - Online Edition, Posted at 11:44 AM EST
주위 대륙들에서는 못살겠다고 아우성인데 유독 캐나다만큼은 불경기를 극복함은 물론 G7 국가내에서도 경제성장을 주도하고 있다는 반가운(?) 소식입니다.
...the IMF forecast (경기예측보고서)more tepid(미지근한) European growth than originally predicted, while Japan's forecast was better although it remains stuck in a recession. Latin America, hampered (저지, 방해) by Argentina's woes (알젠틴의 경제난), is expected to continues to face heightened economic and financial uncertainties.
IMF 보고서는 유럽경제성장세가 예상보다 미온적일 것으로 예측한 반면 일본경제는 불황에 같혀 있음에도 불구 향상될 것으로 보고함. 알젠틴의 경제난에 저지를 받고 있는 남미는 계속해서 경제 및 재정불안의 깊은 고랑을 극복해야 하게 될 것으로 내다봄.
야후사전. ham·per1 － v.t. 1 …을 저지하다, 방해하다, 훼방하다. ㆍ Her long dress ∼ed her freedom of movement. 그녀는 긴 옷을 입고 있어서 자유롭게 움직일 수가 없었다. ☞ PREVENT [동의어] 2 …을 제한하다, 삭감하다, 빼앗다.
－n. 1 방해가 되는 것, 방해물, 속박. 2 『海』 (평상시에는 필요하나 폭풍 때 등에는) 방해가 되는 선구(船具).
Cambridge dictionary... hamper (CAUSE DIFFICULTY) verb [T] to prevent (something) being done easily or (someone) doing something easily Is it always easier working on a computer, or does it sometimes hamper you? Fierce storms have been hampering rescue efforts and there is now little chance of finding more survivors.
m-w dictionary... 1 a : to restrict the movement of by bonds or obstacles : IMPEDE b : to interfere with the operation of : DISRUPT 2 a : CURB, RESTRAIN b : to interfere with : ENCUMBER synonyms HAMPER, TRAMMEL, CLOG, FETTER, SHACKLE, MANACLE mean to hinder or impede in moving, progressing, or acting. HAMPER may imply the effect of any impeding or restraining influence <hampered the investigation by refusing to cooperate>. TRAMMEL suggests entangling by or confining within a net <rules that trammel the artist's creativity>. CLOG usually implies a slowing by something extraneous or encumbering <a court system clogged by frivolous suits>. FETTER suggests a restraining so severe that freedom to move or progress is almost lost <a nation fettered by an antiquated class system>. SHACKLE and MANACLE are stronger than FETTER and suggest total loss of freedom <a mind shackled by stubborn prejudice> <a people manacled by tyranny>.
post.title: hamper
